medium: Single-channel color HD video with sound
text: A single-channel video work with ambient sound featuring a father and son interacting in the basement of their family home. This work features the artist and his father in a number of intimate exchanges that are at times humorous, touching, and awkward/absurd, including the two taking a shower together, browsing the internet together, blowing balloons, and the father riding on the sonâ€™s back.
title: sump
